question: Give me all online learning courses and classroom teaching courses for Mathematics.
sql_query1:
SELECT Courses.Name 
FROM Courses
WHERE (Courses.EducationalMethod = "Online Learning" OR Courses.EducationalMethod = "Classroom Teaching") AND Courses.CurriculumContent = "Mathematics"
sql_query2:
SELECT Courses.Name 
FROM Courses
WHERE Courses.EducationalMethod = "Online Learning" OR Courses.EducationalMethod = "Classroom Teaching" AND Courses.CurriculumContent = "Mathematics"
interpretation1: Show all the Mathematics curriculum courses delivered by either online learning or in classroom teaching methods.
interpretation2: Show all the online learning courses, also show the Mathematics courses delivered by classroom teaching.
